replies.body: Probably still being given out, or at least I hope so. I haven't received mine yet either and I meet the requirements.
Got it this morning! i guess it was just a patience thing.
Yeah they have a lot of people to gift in one day, I'm sure they are on their way.

Same here.
I feel left out. I am the only one of my friends never to get a ban of any type and I still haven't got mine

I'm just going to assume this means we've been bad somehow. I think the system in itself is a little inaccurate from time to time, I don't know about you guys but I've been in situations where I've been reported for sticking up for players, simply refusing to surrender because the win is far more important than a kda and I've had games where ragers have absolutely dampened my spirit... but point aside these people are reporting us as well. I would not be surprised if in some way I've been reported by enough people that disagree on some point or another, especially from my climb from silver -> gold, but in any rank.

P.s. THIS GUY WENT 1-10 REPORT HIM (like nobody has a bad game ever)
yeah same here, i really can't wait to see what i get, if i get one :(
